main: ^The Regatta de Zamboanga is the biggest and the most colorful event in the annual Zamboanga Hermosa Festival. The regatta is a fluvial racing contest, meaning it is held at the bay.

c-0: ^The colorful and beautiful sails of the participating vintas exemplify what “hermosa” is, which means “beautiful” in both Spanish and the local language of Zambuangeños called Chavacano.
^It is celebrated by native Zamboangueños in honor of their patron saint, the La Virgen Nuestra Señora del Pilar de Zarragosa. The festival is conducted throughout the month of October.
